summary: UI Settings Appear Saved But Are Not Applied Without Pressing Save
description: When adjusting settings (e.g., sliders), exiting the Settings menu without pressing “Save” causes values to appear persistent on re-opening, even though the new settings are not actually applied. This creates misleading visual state and inconsistent behavior.
steps: 5. Observe the slider values appear unchanged.
6. Test whether the settings were actually applied.
expected: Settings should either: A) Revert to last saved state upon exiting the menu B) Auto-apply the new settings if visual persistence is intended.
actual: Settings appear saved but are not applied to gameplay.
